name: Extreme Beach Volley
description:
Extreme Beach Volley is an arcade volleyball game, fast and easy to play.
Increase your skills, win tournaments and collect awards! There is over 120 characters and 35 balls to pick from. You can also change court locations.

FEATURES:
- great arcade gameplay
- 3 difficulty levels
- over 120 characters
- over 35 balls
- fun locations

Take your volleyball skills to another level while enjoying the summer with Extreme Beach Volley!
